title: Biblical Units Converter – length, volume, weight (cubit, ephah, talent)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: General: \( \text{target value} = \text{input value} \times \frac{\text{factor of source}}{\text{factor of target}} \) where factors are all expressed in the same base (m, L, g).
